fields.name: Parasite (passive):
fields.value: ** At the beginning of the game, choose a player. They are permanently poisoned. (their ability silently fails, Investigative abilities may be told false information) You may only die if this player dies, and your Faction doesn't have to kill them to win the game

fields.name: Tasty Br- Pie!:
fields.value: ** Attack a player with your Attack Power.
